title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Marriott adds lounge filter to booking process, Hyatt turns to AI
items.description: Marriott has added a new search feature that will help Bonvoy elite members book hotels with lounges.

items.title: Delta's 'route race' ends in a twist: 2 new European islands coming in 2026
items.description: Delta Air Lines is already gearing up for the summer of 2026 in Europe, with new nonstop flights to Malta and Sardinia, Italy, planned.

items.title: Citi Strata Elite: What are the World Legend Mastercard benefits?
items.description: Learn about World Legend Mastercard, Mastercard's latest program that debuted on the Citi Strata Elite card.

items.title: Deal of the day: Book nonstop lie-flat business-class seats to Doha for 70,000 points
items.description: Combine great partner redemption rates with a potentially unique transfer bonus to fly to Doha in comfort and style for less.

items.title: How to use the Delta Stays credit on the Delta Amex cards
items.description: Delta Amex cards offer an annual hotel statement credit for hotels booked through Delta Air Lines' hotel booking platform, Delta Stays. Here's how to ...
